title: Site Averaged Neutron Soil Moisture: 1987 (Betts)
summary: Site averaged product of the neutron probe soil moisture collected during the 1987-1989 FIFE experiment. Samples were averaged for each site, then averaged for each day. Includes only 1987 data.

cmr.title: Site Averaged Neutron Soil Moisture: 1987 (Betts)
cmr.summary: Site averaged product of the neutron probe soil moisture collected during the 1987-1989 FIFE experiment. Samples were averaged for each site, then averaged for each day. Includes only 1987 data.
